subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Nikola Dragovic, a junior forward at U.C.L.A., was released on bail Saturday, a day after being arrested on suspicion of pushing his former live-in girlfriend to the ground during a dispute.
snippet: Nikola Dragovic, a junior forward at U.C.L.A., was released on bail Saturday, a day after being arrested on suspicion of pushing his former live-in girlfriend to the ground during a dispute.
